website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if your living room needs a little livening up and you don't have a lot of space to spare.
pros: Comes in an array of bold colors and prints to tie in with existing accent pieces or just add a splash of color
Soft-touch chenille upholstery retains vibrant colors
Wide seat is well-cushioned with extra padding
cons: The seat is lower than most
Armless design is unlikely to be comfortable enough for everyday use

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I took a gamble since this chair had no reviews, but I'm so glad I did!!! They came all wrapped up with no damage. They were very easy to assemble. And they are pretty comfortable! I bought 2 for our large landing that I had no idea what to do with, and I think they make the space perfect! I'm so happy with my purchase! I'm adding a picture because I always like seeing one in a real environment besides a stock photo, but note that I'm not finished decorating ;)
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the chairs and how they look in my home. I do suggest that you find alternate pillows that go with your decor because the pillows that come with the chairs are small and don't really showcase the chairs as they should. I created my room around these chairs and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri J

customer_reviews.title: My secret office chair.
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than I thought it would be! I love the color. The back isn't crunchy like another reviewer stated. The little pillow has a zippered cover, but I gave the pillow to my daughter. I use this for an office chair. I have my desk hidden in a conputer armoire in the living room. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle, Taylor

customer_reviews.title: FLAWED MANUFACTURING (AGAIN) - SEE PHOTOS
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd terrible experience with Roundhill brand furniture purchased through Amazon. This time, this chair has one leg that is about 1/2" shorter than the rest. NICE. This company's products are GARBAGE. I have to wonder if these pieces aren't factory rejects that are being bought and resold as every single stool, table or chair I have purchased has been DEFECTIVE. Buy at your own risk! I wouldn't take anything from this manufacturer for free at this point. TERRIBLE!! I want to thank Roundhill for wasting copious amounts of my time, money and energy. GARBAGE -- EVERYTHING THIS COMPANY MAKES IS COMPLETE GARBAGE!!!
customer_reviews.author: KRK

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking chair. Easy to assemble, comfortable and stable. My cat also loves it. My cat is a jerk and scratches the sides. I yell at him all the time but he, still on his hind legs, front claws dug deep in the side of the chair, just looks at me with that "Whatcha gonna do about it, Punk?" look. He intimidates the heck outta me. The chair, though is awesome. I will have no problem buying another one, which inevitably I will be doing at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Sled Better

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I ordered this chair in yellow, and at first was skeptical about the color. I was going to use it in my living room next to grey couches and was worried the colors would collide. But, I absolutely love how it looks and my boyfriend loves it even more! He was clowing me about the color and when he saw it, he tried it and now he wont get off my chair 😒 it's very comfortable and I would tell you more but I've only got to sit on it once. He's still on the chair and wont give me a turn. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: P Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Great accent chair at a great price that perfectly matches the decor in our family room
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and style of this chair. Perfect for fall! The color perfectly matches the decor in our family room and helps pull the whole room together. The modern style matches the chair on the opposite side of the fireplace. We purchased this chair to finish staging the family room in our home which is for sale. We chose to use the matching accent pillow that came with the chair on our sofa (shown in the center of the ivory sofa) and used contrasting colored pillows on the chair instead. Great price and super fast delivery by Amazon. Assembly was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: alpartist

customer_reviews.title: NOT at all what I expected. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: When I read the reviews on this chair I felt confident in my purchase. I was deceived. When my husband went to put this chair together, he found that the holes connecting the back to the seat were miss drilled. He spent an extra hour re-drilling the holes at an angle so the chair could be assembled. The quality of the chair is extremely cheap. I expected a Yellow chair, the color is more gold. I just shook my head. Lesson learned, don't buy furniture from an online store. No I would not recommend anyone to purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: The Price is RIght
customer_reviews.text: The chair is the right price for me. Inexpensive and yet very functional and sturdy. It is rather easy to assemble. I found it best not to tighten Bolts all the way, then sit in the chair to Level the Legs then reach under and tighten 2 back bolts and the front Legs. Then check to see if chair is still level then tighten all bolts. This chair looks good in my living room. I bought 2 of these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish for a great value
customer_reviews.text: This chair was an easy assembly and looks great as an accent piece in the room that we put it in. Amazingly it was a great price... and we shopped around a lot! I would definitely buy another one if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Dyanne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so nice and the quality exceeded my expectations. The fabric is soft and the color is just as advertised. I am very pleased with this purchase and I will buy another chair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Marylizzy

customer_reviews.title: Is it blue? Or green?
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've waited a month for this to arrive... And other than the color being very green instead of blue, it's a great chair for the price. But I have to say, if my husband hadn't already assembled it before I returned home from work.... I might have returned it. It's just so NOT turquoise... It green, with a blue cast. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: YsLadyMN

customer_reviews.title: and it wobbles due to legs not being the same size.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several pieces of furniture this week as we lost all we owned a few months ago. This chair was the only problem child. None of the hardware went in exactly as it should and once it did I took it back apart to measure and discover 1 leg is 3 inches shorter than the others. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Moonspinner72

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is the perfect accent piece for my livingroom. The color was spot on (I was matching a color in a painting), and it took no time at all to put the legs on. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alberigi McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Very Happy Purchaser!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect order. Easy to manage with one person. Easily assembled! Follow the directions! DO NOT TIGHTEN UNTIL ALL BOLTS ARE IN PLACE! Color is exactly as pictured! Beautiful gemstone teal, chenille is really nice! Legs are wooden and black. Chairs are comfortable with a large seat! Love them!!!! Highly recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MonaLisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is a perfect size (much bigger than I thought, really!). Super easy to assemble. I assembled this by myself for like 20 minutes. Feels nice and comfy. Very pretty in my room. Though I suspect there would be some indentation over time, for a price, I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: PrincessRosy

customer_reviews.title: Decent teal chair
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to assemble, had to bring out my power drill. The bottom of the chair has a fabric that covers the hardware that was used to assemble, the fabric has a small tear in it when I receive. Overall the chair is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The product came already assembled that should have been the first warning then upon closer inspection all the legs were significantly damaged .you have to wonder what type of people work in the warehouse that they would ship this crap out to a customer . Product was donated my neighbor will repair paint and give to his daughter at school
customer_reviews.author: Mg

customer_reviews.title: When I say it was perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: HELLO WORLD! Despite the mixed, confusing reviews on this chair I decided to take a leap of faith and buy it. When I say it was perfect!!! I mean it is perfect!!! My son put it together in minutes...no snafus as some mentioned. The color, texture and contemporary, sleek design FANTASTIC! SUCH A NICE ACCENT CHAIR FOR THE PRICE .Also, a nice size too! Whoever they had to beat (joking) to get it here on a Sunday in 2 days THANK YOU I WAS BEHIND ON PROJECT. YOU ROCK!!I will be purchasing again now that know what a find it is. Sorry if others had issues DON'T HESITATE! You will be pleased
customer_reviews.author: Glen H.

customer_reviews.title: I gave it three stars just because I purchased the ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it three stars just because I purchased the same exact chair from another vendor and there were no problems with assembly. With this chair, the assembly was problematic. A couple of the screws couldn't be aligned and screwed in. I am returning the chair. It may be that I just got a lemon with this order. The other chair that I received earlier from the other vendor was a breeze to put together but it did cost a little more than the Amazon chair.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment. Entire back of chair came busted. The back just wobbles. Top of chair is poorly constructed and is uneven. Just processed for return.
customer_reviews.author: Nina N.

customer_reviews.title: Really good chair
customer_reviews.text: I needed this color to go with my living room theme and it's perfect. Chair was easy to assembly even by myself, comfortable and sturdy enough. I bought two of them. And thinking about buying another color for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Shevaughn Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful accent chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair checks all the boxes: easy to assemble, affordable, comfortable and is a beautiful accent chair in our guest bedroom. Assembled in less than 30 minutes by a 50-year old woman! Love everything about this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Runner29

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Chinese-made chairs all have similar characteristics, decent material, poor fit and finish and horribly uncomfortable. They use long, wavy metal springs and plastic bands instead of real cushion. This chair is also too short for adults. The seat is almost knee-high.
customer_reviews.author: Hesam H.

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: The item came with no instructions and it was missing hardware I wish I had followed the negative reviews and not made the purchase very bad decision now they are said to be trying to arrange for UPS to come into my home collect furniture piece return to Amazon and provide me a refund this I got to see
customer_reviews.author: nemasa

customer_reviews.title: Better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: This chair is comfy and beautiful in my natural toned living room. I bought two of these chairs since I entertain almost regularly. The only reason I'm not giving the chairs five stars is that there is a manufacturer defect on one of them. After they were assembled, my husband told me that the area where the seat back meets the seat, a drill hole was missing to insert the screw. The chair is holding up just fine without and we use them regularly. Two people say on the one chair together (not knowing) and it held up. It was a couple tht together probably weigh about 370lbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I'm actually pretty good at it
customer_reviews.text: I have assembled lots of furniture in my lifetime, and I'm actually pretty good at it. You would think these chairs would be simple to assemble but they were a corker!! It's the second day of my hands are still sore. I have blisters, and a cut on my pinky. The bolts were so hard to screw in by hand and at first I was thinking it was just something off with the first chair, but assembling the second chair was the same!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble! Came with a few scratches that's why I gave it 4 stars. Other than that, great chair. Comfortable & sturdy
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice chair great color + Height
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my daughter and she just loves it. We where looking for a high back chair that was not only stylish but comfortable and this chair is definitely worth buying. The only draw back (which is more my fault) is the fact that the chair slides on hardwood floors. So it is good to have some type of rubber placed on the bottom of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: martist

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS chair
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS chair! Matches my decor, comfy and sturdy. I thought it would be too low for my bad knees, but you don't sink at all. One screw was very hard to fit in because the hole wasn't big enough. I just used a bigger screw to force it in. One leg is shorter than the other, but I just put two felt pads on that leg. I don't nitpick. Lol
customer_reviews.author: DirtyRed

customer_reviews.title: I really like this chair.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric and the color. For the money and a side chair it is excellent. Although it isn’t very strong and the padding isn’t very quality for a heavier person. That being said, I still really like this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Caution on Color
customer_reviews.text: We returned these. They are comfy and seem sturdy enough. The pillow does add something to them, but the color did not look like it did online. It is VERY teal. The only way I can describe it is teeny-booper teal. It belongs in a brighter, "fun" room not in my living room I'm trying to make cozy and sophisticated.
customer_reviews.author: Batmanda

customer_reviews.title: True to Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these accent chairs for my kids' playroom, and we absolutely love them! The teal color is true to the photos, and the seats are comfortable. There is a little "crunchiness" to the chairs as one reviewer mentioned, but I believe that may wear off over time. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Diva

customer_reviews.title: that they were a full size chair
customer_reviews.text: color was great chairs went together easy and the wife loves them
customer_reviews.author: Linda Romano

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This chair is used as an accent chair in our bedroom and works perfectly for that. It was fairly easy to put together and seem to be of decent quality. It will not be used a lot, but fits the bill for an accent chair. The only complaint I have is one of the legs cracked a little when I installed it. I glued and clamped it and it is fine, but disappointed that happened.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis68

customer_reviews.title: Chair
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair love the color blue green sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Noemia

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: I give this chair two stars for the design only. Unfortunately, the seat has very little padding. When you are seated you can feel the wood frame, making the chair very uncomfortable. In addition, the fabric stretches out along the sides of the seat because it's sitting on the wood frame. I would have returned this chair had shipping not been so expensive and the packaging of such a large item so awkward.
customer_reviews.author: D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for my purpose. It's really pretty. It wasn't easy to put together but I can't say it was really hard either. The directions say it's a two person project and I think that's probably true. I didn't have anyone to help but it would have been easier for two people.
customer_reviews.author: TexxasGal

customer_reviews.title: Prettier in person, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these chairs. The print is so crisp and clean. They only took about 30 minutes to assemble and that was only because I used the wrong screws on the first one, but once I had that fixed, the second one was a breeze. They could easily be put together in like 5 minutes by a more assembly inclined person lol.. I've been searching for a 2cent chairs all over and these were the best and best prices by far. Also, They were delivered 3 days earlier than promised, I could not be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: T Yang

customer_reviews.title: Chair for bedroom use
customer_reviews.text: Once we finish assembling it was fine There was some challenge
customer_reviews.author: Shelley G

customer_reviews.title: Lovely to look at, be careful when sitting
customer_reviews.text: The chair looks lovely and is exactly as described. The order arrived a few days early. However, if you have boys in your house who tend to be rough or are not too careful this chair may not be for you. It is a very lightweight construction and the back piece is not as firmly on as I would like. I have to tell people to be careful because the chair is just one heavy sit down away from snapping.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: LOVING THEM
customer_reviews.text: I purchase 4 of the green chairs to use as my kitchen chairs. they are deep and very comfortable, as my family tends to hangout in that area. this was a unusual but perfect choice for us.
customer_reviews.author: Breon Pollard

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with the item, but because I don’t want to take it apart and repackage it, I’ll keep it. It came with slight damaged, a little dirty and missing the pillow. I just keep telling myself it’s vintage!! It’s functional.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chair but don't sit in it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair and material. My son-in-law sat in it on thanksgiving (I only had the chair together a week), and when he went to get up, the front legs collapsed. We probably could've fixed the legs, but the material tore as well. If there's a 'weight limit', it should be specified in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Great color, super uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look great! But they are sooooo uncomfortable. The seat is hard and its awkwardly long. The padding ends 6” before the back of the chair and it’s just weird to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica-CO

customer_reviews.title: Economical price for lovely chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a firm but comfortable chair in a lovely, soft fabric. I chose the green and the color is true to that pictured on line. It was simple to put together and looks very fine in my guest room. The price was modest so the quality is a good surprise.
customer_reviews.author: BDP74

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as an occasional chair for my bedroom. I love the color and style, and it fits in perfectly. It was easy to assemble and is comfortable. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Louise A. Brouillette

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts on both chairs
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this purchase and when i opened the box the chairs were beautiful but thats where it ends... i was very dissapointed that both chairs i purchased were missing not only the hardware but the two front legs... on both chairs! sending back for a replacement hopefully i will have a chance to update my review but as of now i am not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price point, I’m satisfied with my purchase. Don’t expect this chair to be very supportive or take a lot of wear and tear but it’s good for occasional use. I wish there were some sort of spring coils or anything that supported to cushion but alas it just sort of sinks in when you sit on it. I keep it in my bedroom and really only sit on it when I’m getting dressed. I’m giving it 4 stars because it looks great and serves its purpose in my space.
customer_reviews.author: Ian S. Karg

customer_reviews.title: S'alright
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived exactly as described, color is vibrant, fabric is cute. Easy to assemble and more comfortable than I expected. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McDTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I like it and the yellow is a little bright like I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair of the yellow is dry enough for me and it goes great as the accent chair in my living room I only wish the feet did not slide easy on Hardcourts the one I have to put it in area where it will stay put against the wall other than that it’s fine
customer_reviews.author: tae

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in color; it was a washed out yellow and not a true yellow as the website says. The holes were not drilled properly for assembly. Chair measurements were incorrect. Product was made in china which accounts for the problems. I'll never order furniture products from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Daws

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Not worth what I paid. Not enough seat cushion. You can feel the wood as you sit. It sinks in too much. The only thing I like is the color. At least the back rest is padded enough.
customer_reviews.author: dman007

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I saw this chair I fell in love with it. So, my husband, Keith, ordered it for me. I thought I could use it as an office chair at my desk. However, when I received it, it was too low. I asked my husband to return it for one with more height in the seat area. But, after a while, I decided to keep it and create a way for it to serve the purpose for which I brought it. My creative idea worked. I love this chair. It is so soft, comfortable. and relaxing. I LOVE THIS CHAIR. Mrs. Eunice Booker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise very pretty. Subtracted a star because I expect all parts ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was missing part that goes on bottom if one leg. So I had to go prchase one. Otherwise very pretty. Subtracted a star because I expect all parts when I buy something.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie T.

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: Put them together fairly quickly. Easy to follow instructions. Assembly for each took about 15 minutes. They look great!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: quite  comfy
customer_reviews.text: beautiful comfortable sleak. I just moved into a small senior apt.thankfully I bought two chairs one is in the bedroom the other fit right in the living room. the color is vibrant and the chair brings the room together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish, comfortable, and seems like a solid chair. My only negative would be the bolts not lining up properly when putting the chair together. The chair should literally take 10-15 minutes to put together, but took me about 20-30 because of the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: JRNYC05

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair was easy to assemble,just put on the legs. It's very comfortable and we are enjoying it very much. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wished I could find another
customer_reviews.text: love! I only ordered 1 to make sure I would like. Loved the chair. When to order another but the price went up $30 and now totally out of stock. Now I have 1 lone orange chair. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Pam Burkhalter

customer_reviews.title: Cute Chair - The fabric is coming loose from the seat cushion after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Cute Chair - The fabric is coming loose from the seat cushion after 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stoughton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This chair arrived carefully packed with relatively clear instructions. ( some of the letters on the directions were backwards but we figured it out . ESL maybe? ) . The color was exactly what I expected and it fit well in the room. I consider this chair a reasonably good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: This chair looks good in our bedroom as an accent chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks good in our bedroom as an accent chair, but it is not comfortable at all. It works as a place to sit for a moment and tie your shoes, but even when you sit for a second you can feel the frame under the cushion. It's not the most expensive chair, and it feels like it. We tossed the box or we would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The chair is beautiful but this is the second one I received (I ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair is beautiful but this is the second one I received (I had to return the first one for the same problem) that I can't put together because the screws are not right to fittings. It's very frustrating. This time I was able to get one side screwed but the other side wouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Trish M

customer_reviews.title: Well made and super cute
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how inexpensive this chair was. I ordered the orange ones, which is more like a vintage rusty orange. It has dark expressions brown legs that went perfect with my accent table. Amazing deal, so I bought two. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Island MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and I received it like this. I want a replacement as soon as possible. I always by products from your store and I don’t understand what happened at this time.
customer_reviews.author: yamile florentino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Screwing in the legs was very difficult had to be done at such an angle and was unclear on that package information very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: Great company and a great chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. Delivery was fast, and assembly was easy. It’s just what a space in my spare bedroom needed. I highly recommend buying from this dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Craftylady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect decorative side chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for the decorative side chair I was looking for. Shipped quickly and was packaged securely. I read other review tips for assembly and it was very easy to put together. Took maybe 15 minutes to put together by myself. It adds a nice pop of color to the room and is well made, especially for the price. I have 2 cats that are mostly black, but does NOT show the hair which is a bonus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our rental condo in Florida. It is solidly constructed, assembled easily and is comfortable. It sits rather low to the floor but we knew this when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: mstanek99

customer_reviews.title: Great Item & Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair and great item for the price. It was packaged nicely and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's very comfortable and works great as a reading chair. I have it in a small corner next to my window and it fit perfectly. I can actually sit on it with my legs on the chair as well (I'm 5ft 3). The little accent pillow is very cute, too. It took me maybe half an hour to put the chair together. It is packaged well and the tools and instructions are provided for you. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These chairs exceeded my expectations. They are beautiful and very sturdy. Exactly what I wanted - put together simply and quickly. A great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Zanread

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little chair! It was easy to assemble and it adds just the pop I needed for my living room
customer_reviews.author: Shamika Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: Construction of this chair requires aligning several screws of various lengths. I had to unscrew and re-screw the pieces several times to get everything to fit. Ultimately when I was done the chair still didn't end up being stable. Only three legs touch the floor at any one time. Useless and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Djordjevich

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Beautiful chair.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the quality and beauty of this chair. Easy to assemble. Sturdy and comfortable. Bought red one, color is a deeper tone with almost a dark orangish red color. Nice accent chair, great addition to room. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMomma

customer_reviews.title: ... my living room decor and could not be more pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two blue chairs as part of my living room decor and could not be more pleased with my purchase. The color is bold but not tacky, and they were very easy to assemble. My husband had each together in about 10 minutes, no trouble. They are also very comfortable. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Belle

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and I won!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. It looks just like the picture and is really well built. My wife didn’t like the idea of buying a chair online without physically seeing it and she loved it. I’d recommend this to anyone looking for a great design piece. Sits great too!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love my little chair - it looks much more expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: Love my little chair - it looks much more expensive than its actual price. I'm thinking of ordering another so I'll have a pair. I wanted an inexpensive chair to use in staging my condo for sale, to add brightness and modernity to my living room, and now I'll have a lovely chair or two to take with me. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Indy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color with my decor
customer_reviews.text: So nice and comfortable. The color is perfect for my decor. Pics coming soon
customer_reviews.author: E K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and I am a big girl, lovely vibrant color and comfy to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Keck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color & easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The chairs perfectly match the room. They were easy to assemble. They aren't the most comfortable chairs (they seem delicate) but I figured going into the purchase. They also rub off blue on the wall so be mindful. All in all, I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair was the perfect size for the space I needed To fill, great color matched the color in my rug that I was trying to bring out perfectly. Arrived when they said it would and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: TLHCoffey

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the accent chair that is used by guests, not a chair to set in a lot I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful accent chairs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for accent chairs that were comfortable, inexpensive, and stylish. These were perfect. Easy to assemble and are built well. I purchased a teal color set and color is beautiful. Satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Irie Love

customer_reviews.title: The chair itself is nice but one of the legs is shorter than the ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself is nice but one of the legs is shorter than the rest. Tried to get the leg part and they said refund or replace. Good options but I don’t feel like taking the chair apart and having to repack....
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just wow! This is a great chair for the money. The quality far surpasses my expectations. It fits perfectly in my bedroom and because it sits low, it's excellent for putting on my socks and hosiery.
customer_reviews.author: Reader Lady

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's not great, the padding sucks, and the legs break in half with minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chair. We are using it with our desk
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Chair. We are using it with our desk. We do not sit at the desk much but its perfect. The seat is wide, big and comfy. The fabric is soft and the color is just what I was loiking for. The chair does sit pretty low. The pillow has no filling but a bag of filling will fix that issue. I will add a photo later to show how nice it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Abby'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this it never arrived but I got a refund. I was nervous to order it again but glad I did. I love it! Lovely colour and larger than I expected which is a good thing. Deep seat, high back (I am 5 ft 2 in) and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: x-clamation

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I brought two and they were easy to install but the only thing that bothered me was that the color was not a dark teal like in the picture. It was like a washed out teal color and it didn’t match my furniture what so ever. They are comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: Anwar and Mohanad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chairs
customer_reviews.text: This chairs are nice comfy and big. Takes 5 to 10 min. To put together. I love the softness and the durability of the chair. I would recommend this chair to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Shamia Evans

customer_reviews.title: computer chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this green chair I use it for my computer
customer_reviews.author: pattie boyd

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! Easy to assemble and the color is perfect. I absolutely love option to see it in your home(the first picture was the photoshop). This was a great idea because it actually helped us see what it would look like in our living room! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Had no issues with the chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Mine went together very easily and sits well. Color and texture are nice. It’s not what I would call an everyday sitting chair but is a very nice accent chair
customer_reviews.author: LeAnna Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love!! I bought 2 and could not be happier! Loved the price-- especially knowing how comfortable & beautiful they are. Every person who visits mentions how much they love our new living room (we only added the 2 chairs, but it does feel like a new room!) Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: The color and texture is exactly as pictured. However, it began to show signs of wear at 10 months of inconsistent use. One of the seems started ripping and the edge of one of the legs began to wear off.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A little wobbly but can easily be fixed. I made the mistake of tightening in each screw as I went and some of the longer screws would not go in all the way. The included instructions actually says not to tighten any bolts until all bolts have been started (in capital letters and an exclamation mark.. but I still somehow missed that step. Lol)
customer_reviews.author: UNKNOWN

customer_reviews.title: Chair is very nice..
customer_reviews.text: Chair is very nice... I didn't pay attention to the height which is my fault. It's a little lower than I expected. One of the legs is off so I think I have to take them off to find the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It offers value for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Primers

product_meta.title: Roundhill Furniture Pisano Teal Blue Fabric Armless Contemporary Accent Chair with Kidney Pillow, Single
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueDraw attention to an otherwise empty corner of the room by adding this Pisano Teal Blue Accent Chair with Pillow. This chair is covered in a velvety chenille teal blue fabric that will add a festive pop of color to any space, and the armless feature is both casual and stylish. All fabrics are pre-approved for wear ability and durability against AHFA standards. A sturdy frame supports the piece, constructed from solid hardwood and finished in a rich espresso. Padding is provided by high-density foam. The matching kidney pillow adds a distinctive look and comfort, too.

NOTE:
All units do come with all parts. On the underside of the lower seat cushion there is a compartment, all hardware and the front 2 legs are stored there during shipping.
feature_bullets: This durable chair is crafted with solid wood legs and a chenille fiber weave, which means it is built to withstand extensive use through time. Ready to Assemble
The chair comes with a matching fabric accent pillow to complete the look. The sturdy legs is coated with deep espresso finish. It's solidly made of wood frame which offer a solid foundation
Upholstery Color: Teal Blue. The seat and back are padded for great comfortable feeling. The unique graffiti design is a nice touch of modern contemporary appeal
Set up Dimension: 22.75" W x 31.75" D x 36.5" H; Seat height 17.75"; Apron height 7.75"; Apron to floor 10"; Pillow 18.00" x 8.50" x 5.50"
Photo May Slightly Different From Actual Item in Terms of Color Due to the Lighting During Photo Shooting or the Monitor's Display
